spin.description: Spin state of each element. Allowed Values 0 or 1. 0 means low spin state and 1 means high spin state. Spin state depends on oxidation state and electronic configuration

valOrbOcc.description: valence orbital occupation - contribution from s, p, d, and f to valence - depends on electronic configuration. Ref:https://www.nature.com/articles/npjcompumats201628#s1

items.description: array of s,p,d,f contributions for individual element
